snippet: T-shirt descriptions inspired the works in “Raw/Cooked: Ulrike Müller,” at the Brooklyn Museum.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit Raw/Cooked: Ulrike Muller, a collaborative project begun by Muller, at the Brooklyn Museum.
lead_paragraph: T-shirt descriptions inspired the works in “Raw/Cooked: Ulrike Müller,” at the Brooklyn Museum.
